allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
FIX: Prevent duplicate activity completions and resolve build errors

- Add guard in markActivityComplete to prevent multiple completions on same day
- Fix ActivityViewScreen to use latest activity state from provider for accurate UI
- Add label\(\) and icon\(\) helper methods to ActivityCategories class
- Fix nullable Activity type in dashboard navigation callback

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
